title: montreal1
author: montreal1
content: Auction for a 2012 5 BTC Casascius Coin that is repackaged, slabbed with Nasty, and loadable. It is not currently loaded. Please see this thread for reference: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=658331.0STARTING BID: .0000 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: .0001 BTCEND TIME: DECEMBER 9th, 2022, 12:00 NOON ESTPayment due in BTC within 24 hours of auction end. I will send the winner the payment addressSNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.SHIPPING: $10 with tracking anywhere in the United States. $20 with tracking outside of the United States.Escrow allowed, winner pays fees.

comments.author: montreal1
comments.body: thank you for the bids so far! Ends Friday - final bump
